page.title: 14Moniaive Primary School
page.content: Mrs.Robson teaches at Moniaive Primary and is an incomer to the village.She likes Moniaive very much and greatly enjoys her job.School today is more interesting and teachers work harder with the modern methods.An advantage of living and working in the same village is that you do not need to get up so early because your work is near(she hates getting up in the morning).A disadvantage is that she never really gets away from her work as parents find it handy to phone her or call at her house if they have a problem.She has been in her present job for 7 years and has seen some changes.The cloakroom used to be an office,she used to teach P1/P2 but now teaches P3/P4 and a new head called Mr.Mc.Larty came in October 1983.
